sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAGUNTUM, an ancient town of Spain, now called Morvedro, where there are ſtill the ruins of a Roman amphitheatre to be ſeen. The new town is ſeated on a river called Mοrvedro, 15 miles to the north of Valencia, in E. Long. 0. 10. N. Lat. 39. 38. It was taken by Lord Peterborough in 17c6.
